label: HedElement
Description: Any item in a HED schema.
Comment: Used to anchor all items in both the structural schema and the tags.

label: HedSchema
Description: The overall structure of the HED schema by section.
Equivalence: heds:HedElement and (containsHedSection exactly 1 HedHeaderSection) and (containsHedSection exactly 1 HedPrologueSection) and (containsHedSection exactly 1 HedSchemaSection) and (containsHedSection exactly 1 HedEndSchemaSection) and (containsHedSection exactly 1 HedUnitClassDefinitionSection) and (containsHedSection exactly 1 HedUnitModifierDefinitionSection) and (containsHedSection exactly 1 HedValueClassDefinitionSection) and (containsHedSection exactly 1 HedSchemaAttributeDefinitionSection) and (containsHedSection exactly 1 HedAttributePropertyDefinitionSection) and (containsHedSection exactly 1 HedEpilogueSection) and (containsHedSection exactly 1 HedEndSection)

label: HedSection
Description: Any section of the HED schema structure.
Comment: This is a structural class defining the different sections of the HED schema.

label: HedHeaderSection
Description: The HED schema header structure.
Comment: The schema header contains the HED schema version, which is distinct from the ontology version.

label: HedPrologueSection
Description: The schema section containing an introduction to this HED schema.

label: HedSchemaSection
Description: The schema section for main body of the schema containing the HED vocabulary.

label: HedEndSchemaSection
Description: The required marker for the end of the HED schema vocabulary section.

label: HedUnitClassDefinitionSection
Description: The schema section defining unit classes and the units for the nodes.

label: HedUnitModifierDefinitionSection
Description: The definitions of unit multiples and submultiples.

label: HedValueClassDefinitionSection
Description: The definitions of values allowed for placeholders.

label: HedSchemaAttributeDefinitionSection
Description: Definitions of attributes for elements in other sections of the HED schema.

label: HedEpilogueSection
Description: The ending section containing material such as citation, licensing, and other information.

label: HedEndSection
Description: The required end marker for the HED schema.

label: HedTag
Description: A HED vocabulary term or node.
Comment: A HedElement that is in the HEDSchemaSection and represents a HED tag.

label: HedUnitClass
Description: A category of units such as acceleration units.
Comment: HED unit class definitions are in the HedUnitClassDefinitionSection section of the HED schema.

label: HedUnit
Description: A unit element such as seconds.
Comment: HED units have a isOfUnitType association with a HedUnitClass.
Equivalence: HedElement and (inSchemaSection HedUnitClassDefinitionSection) and (isOfUnitType some HedUnitClass)

label: HedUnitModifier
Description: A unit modifier such as kilo.
Comment: A unit modifier is in the HEDUnitModifierDefinitionSection of the HED schema.

label: HedValueClass
Description: Rules for a type of value provided by users to substitute for placeholders.
Comment: A value class is in the HedValueClassDefinitionSection of the HED schema.

label: HedHeader
Description: Contains the specification of the schema version and partnership.
Equivalence: HedElement and (inHedSection exactly 1 HedHeaderSection) and (version exactly 1 xsd:string) and (library max 1 xsd:string) and (unmerged 1 xsd:string) and (withStandard max 1 xsd:boolean)

label: HedPrologue
Description: The introductory text of a HED schema which describes is purpose and scope.

label: HedEpilogue
Description: The end piece text of a HED schema which describes sources and other reference material.
